Item.method_code:
' use beforeDelete of Project Space items ' necesary so that afterDelete action can read the config_id and use it in its logic Dim thisItem As Item = Me.newItem(Me.GetType(),"get") thisItem.setID(Me.getID()) thisItem.setAttribute("select","team_id,config_id,name") thisItem.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") thisItem = thisItem.apply()
' add properties to context Me.setProperty("config_id",thisItem.getProperty("config_id","")) Me.setProperty("team_id",thisItem.getProperty("team_id",""))
Item.name: Add Props to Folder BeforeDelete
